name: TOON ROLL
description:
STORY:

THE PLAYER IS A CIRQUE BALL. ONE DAY THE CLOWN WAS PLAYING WITH YOU THEN HE FELL AND DROPPED YOU, SO YOU ENTERED A NEW WORLD AND YOU NEED TO ESCAPE.

THE GAME IS MADE IN ONE WEEK FOR A CHALLENGE:

  • COMPLETE ALL THE LEVELS
  • SPEEDRUN THE GAME
  • LISTEN TO OLD CARTOONY MUSIC
  • HARD MODE ACTIVATED
